title: How to get at least a 50% on an essay? Could I do this just by writing in the correct format - Quora

response.answer_text: A so-called “correct format” is just broad architecture. What you really need is content. If you have a well-thought out thesis, and good arguments laid out in an organized, cohesive way, you don’t need to abide the “correct format,” whatever your definition of that is. The best way to achieve 50% on an essay is to aim for 100%, and if you fall short, you’ll probably be in the range of 50–80%. Read essays and articles in magazines like TIME or Newsweek. Get familiar with clear, well-written sentences/paragraphs. Add new vocabulary to your repertoire. Become well-informed so you have content (current events, history, opinions, facts, trends, scientific studies, etc.) to draw upon when you actually write that 50% essay.
I don’t understand your question. 50% is a failing grade. You’re asking how to fail your essay? Wouldn’t you want to get 100%?
